citations.narrative:
A new Institutional Official (IO) was appointed on October 26, 2021. At the time of inspection, the facility had not reported
this change to the Deputy Administrator. A research facility shall notify the Deputy Administrator of any change in name,
address, or ownership, or other change in operations within 10 days after making the change.
To Be Corrected: 1/25/2022
There were no regulated species present at the time of inspection.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with Attending Veterinarian.
End Section

narrative:
2.30(c)(1) 
   
Registration. 
A new Institutional Official (IO) was appointed on October 26, 2021.  At the time of inspection, the facility had not reported 
this change to the Deputy Administrator.  A research facility shall notify the Deputy Administrator of any change in name, 
address, or ownership, or other change in operations within 10 days after making the change. 
 
To Be Corrected: 1/25/2022 
 
There were no regulated species present at the time of inspection. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with Attending Veterinarian. 
 
End Section
